newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Aeroflot opens Moscow-Cancun route Oct 26.
newsitem.headline: Aeroflot opens Moscow-Cancun route Oct 26.

text.p: Russia's Aeroflot International Airlines will begin regular service between Moscow and Cancun, Mexico from October 26, a company spokeswoman said on Monday.

Yuliya Maryashkina said Aeroflot would open service on Fridays on wide-body A-310 jets, departing Moscow Sheremetyevo Airport with stopovers at Ireland's Shannon airport and Miami. The flight will last 12 hours.
"We hope to attract many tourists for these flights because Cancun is a famous resort," she said.
Aeroflot also on October 26 will introduce A-310 service on its regular Wednesday Moscow-Mexico City flight, replacing aging Ilyushin-62 aircraft, Maryashkina said.
